010package More_;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.requestSampleImage;
014
015import java.awt.Color;
016import java.awt.Font;
017import java.awt.Shape;
018import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
019import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Locale;
022
023import ij.IJ;
024import ij.ImagePlus;
025import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
026import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
027import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
028import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
029import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.CssColorSequencer;
030import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
031import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptor;
032import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptorUniform;
033import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.Utils;
034import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
035import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
036import imagingbook.common.math.Complex;
037import imagingbook.common.regions.Contour;
038import imagingbook.common.regions.ContourTracer;
039import imagingbook.common.regions.RegionContourSegmentation;
040import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
041
042/**
043 * <p>
044 * This ImageJ plugin visualizes the composition of 2D shapes by superposition
045 * of nested ellipses, corresponding to complex coefficient pairs of elliptic
046 * Fourier descriptors.
047 * </p>
048 * <p>
049 * The plugin assumes that the input image is binary (of type
050 * {@link ByteProcessor}). It is segmented and the outer contour of the largest
051 * connected component is used to calculate a Fourier descriptor (of type
052 * {@link FourierDescriptorUniform}) with a user-defined number of coefficient
053 * pairs. The plugin then displays a sequence of frames illustrating the
054 * reconstruction of the shape by superposition of nested ellipses as the path
055 * parameter (t) runs from 0 to 1. See Sec. 26.3.6 (esp. Fig. 26.12) of [1] for
056 * details.
057 * </p>
058 * <p>
059 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
060 * Algorithmic Introduction Using Java</em>, 2nd ed, Springer (2016).
061 * </p>
062 * @author WB
063 * @version 2022/10/28
064 */
065public class Fourier_Descriptor_Animation implements PlugInFilter {
066        
067        private static int FourierCoefficientPairs = 3;
068        
069        // visualization-related settings
070        private static int StepsPerFullRevolution = 500;
071        private static int StepsPerSecond = 10;
072        
073        private static boolean ShowOriginalContour = true;
074        private static boolean ShowFullReconstruction = true;
075        private static boolean ShowEllipseTree = true;
076        private static boolean ShowPathParameter = true;
077        
078        private static int ReconstructionPoints = 100;
079        
080        private static Color ContourColor = new Color(0, 60, 255);
081        private static double ContourStrokeWidth = 0.25;
082        private static double ReconstructionMarkerRadius = 3.0;
083        private static Color ReconstructionColor = new Color(0, 185, 15);
084        private static double ReconstructionStrokeWidth = 0.5;
085        
086        private static Font PathParameterFont = new Font(Font.MONOSPACED, Font.PLAIN, 10);
087        
088        private ImagePlus im;
089        
090        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
091        
092        /**
093         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
094         * is currently open.
095         */
096        public Fourier_Descriptor_Animation() {
097                if (noCurrentImage()) {
098                        requestSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.MapleLeafSmall);
099                }
100        }
101        
102        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
103        
104        @Override
105        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
106        this.im = im;
107                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
108        }
109        
110        @Override
111        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
112                
113                if (!runDialog()) {
114                        return;
115                }
116                
117                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) ip;
118                Pnt2d[] contr = getLargestRegionContour(bp);
119                FourierDescriptor fd = FourierDescriptorUniform.from(Utils.toComplexArray(contr), FourierCoefficientPairs);
120                Complex ctr = fd.getCoefficient(0);
121                
122                ImagePlus imA = makeBackgroundImage();  
123                imA.show();
124                
125                ColoredStroke contourStroke = new ColoredStroke(ContourStrokeWidth, ContourColor);
126                ColoredStroke reconstructionStroke = new ColoredStroke(ReconstructionStrokeWidth, ReconstructionColor);
127                
128                long frameTimeMs = Math.round(1000.0/StepsPerSecond);
129                boolean done = false;
130
131                while (!done) {         
132                        for (int k = 0; k < StepsPerFullRevolution; k++) {              
133                                if (IJ.escapePressed() || imA.getWindow() == null || imA.getWindow().isClosed()) {
134                                        done = true; break;
135                                }
136                                
137                                double t = (double) k / StepsPerFullRevolution; // t in [0,1]
138                                long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
139                                
140                                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
141                                
142                                if (ShowPathParameter) {
143                                        ola.addText(5, 0, String.format(Locale.US, "t=%.4f", t), PathParameterFont, Color.black);
144                                }
145
146                                if (ShowOriginalContour) {
147                                        ola.addShape(toClosedPath(contr), contourStroke);
148                                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(ctr.re, ctr.im).getShape());
149                                }
150
151                                if (ShowFullReconstruction) { // draw the shape reconstructed from all FD-pairs
152                                        Path2D rec = Utils.toPath(fd.getShapeFull(ReconstructionPoints));
153                                        ola.addShape(rec, reconstructionStroke);
154                                }
155
156                                if (ShowEllipseTree) {
157                                        Complex cc = ctr;       // current ellipse center
158                                        CssColorSequencer csq = new CssColorSequencer();
159                                        csq.setRandomSeed(17);
160                                        for (int m = 1; m <= FourierCoefficientPairs; m++) {
161                                                Color ellcol = csq.next();
162                                                ColoredStroke ellipseStroke = new ColoredStroke(ReconstructionStrokeWidth/2, ellcol);
163                                                
164                                                // draw the ellipse for FD pair m:
165                                                Shape ellipse = fd.getEllipse(m);                       
166                                                AffineTransform trans = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(cc.re, cc.im);
167                                                Shape shape = trans.createTransformedShape(ellipse);
168                                                ola.addShape(shape, ellipseStroke);
169
170                                                // show marker for current path position for t
171                                                Complex cNext = cc.add(fd.getShapePointPair(m, t));
172                                                ellipseStroke.setFillColor(ellcol);
173                                                ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(cNext.toArray()).getShape(ReconstructionMarkerRadius), ellipseStroke);
174                                                
175                                                // make current point the center of the next ellipse
176                                                cc = cc.add(cNext);
177                                                cc = cNext;
178                                        }
179                                }
180
181                                imA.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
182                                imA.updateAndDraw();
183                                
184                                // check and wait if needed:
185                                long elapsedTime = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
186                                int remainingTime = (int) (frameTimeMs - elapsedTime);
187                                if (remainingTime > 0) {
188                                        IJ.wait(remainingTime);
189                                }
190                        }
191                }
192        }
193
194        private void brighten(ByteProcessor ip, int minGray) {
195                 float scale = (255 - minGray) / 255f;
196                 int[] table = new int[256];
197                 for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
198                         table[i] = Math.round(minGray + scale * i);
199                         
200                 }
201                 ip.applyTable(table);
202        }
203
204        // -------------------------------------------------------------
205        
206        private Pnt2d[]  getLargestRegionContour(ByteProcessor ip) {
207                //  label regions and trace contours
208                ContourTracer tracer = new RegionContourSegmentation(ip);
209                List<? extends Contour> outerContours = tracer.getOuterContours(true);
210                
211                if (outerContours.isEmpty()) {
212                        IJ.error("no regions found");
213                        return null;
214                }
215                
216                return outerContours.get(0).getPointArray();    // contour of largest region
217        }
218        
219        private ImagePlus makeBackgroundImage() {
220                ByteProcessor bp = im.getProcessor().convertToByteProcessor();
221                String title = String.format("%s-partial-%03d", im.getShortTitle(), FourierCoefficientPairs);
222                
223                if (bp.isInvertedLut()) {
224                        bp.invert();
225                        bp.invertLut();
226                }
227                brighten(bp, 220);      
228                return new ImagePlus(title, bp);
229        }
230        
231        private Path2D toClosedPath(Pnt2d[] pnts) {
232                Path2D path = new Path2D.Float();
233                path.moveTo(pnts[0].getX(), pnts[0].getY());
234                for (int i = 1; i < pnts.length; i++) {
235                        path.lineTo(pnts[i].getX(), pnts[i].getY());
236                }
237                path.closePath();
238                return path;
239        }
240        
241        // -------------------------------------------------------------
242        
243        private boolean runDialog() {
244                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
245                gd.addMessage("Fourier decomposition parameters:");
246                gd.addNumericField("Number of FD pairs (min. 1)", FourierCoefficientPairs, 0);
247                gd.addNumericField("Reconstruction Points", ReconstructionPoints, 0);
248                
249                gd.addMessage("Animation parameters:");
250                gd.addNumericField("Steps per full revolution", StepsPerFullRevolution, 0);
251                gd.addNumericField("Steps per second", StepsPerSecond, 0);
252                
253                gd.addCheckbox("Show Original Contour", ShowOriginalContour);
254                gd.addCheckbox("Show Full Reconstruction", ShowFullReconstruction);
255                gd.addCheckbox("Show Ellipse Tree", ShowEllipseTree);
256                gd.addCheckbox("Show Path Parameter (t)", ShowPathParameter);
257                
258                gd.showDialog();
259                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
260                        return false;
261                
262                FourierCoefficientPairs = Math.max(1, (int) gd.getNextNumber());
263                ReconstructionPoints = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
264                
265                StepsPerFullRevolution = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
266                StepsPerSecond = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
267                
268                ShowOriginalContour = gd.getNextBoolean();
269                ShowFullReconstruction = gd.getNextBoolean();
270                ShowEllipseTree = gd.getNextBoolean();
271                ShowPathParameter = gd.getNextBoolean();
272                
273                gd.addMessage("Press ESC or close window to stop animation.");
274                return true;
275        }
276        
277}
